tooltip.lockedToken: This token is locked. Colony native tokens are locked and non-transferrable by default to avoid unwanted project token transfer outside of the colony.
tooltip.forceToggle: Toggle "Force" to bypass governance and perform this action immediately. This is only possible with the right permissions.

membersPage.title: Members
membersPage.description: Contributors and followers of the Colony
membersPage.contributors.title: Contributors
membersPage.contributors.description: Contributors are members of the Colony with reputation and permissions
membersPage.contributors.emptyTitle: There are no contributors in the Colony yet
membersPage.contributors.emptyDescriptio: Invite members to join, follow and contribute to the Colony
membersPage.followers.emptyTitle: There are no followers in the Colony yet
membersPage.followers.title: Followers
membersPage.followers.description: Followers are members who don't have any reputation within the Colony

userProfilePage.title: Profile
userProfilePage.description: Edit and update your account information
userPreferencesPage.title: Preferences
userPreferencesPage.description: Set your preferences for your Colony account
userAdvancedPage.title: Advanced settings
userAdvancedPage.description: Customise and control your Colony account
advancedSettings.fees.title: Colony pays my gas fees
advancedSettings.fees.description: Enable this to have the Metacolony cover your gas fees when performing actions on Colony. All you need to do is sign it. This is currently supported on select chains.
advancedSettings.fees.tooltip: Disabling this option means you will have to pay your own gas fees.
advancedSettings.fees.toast.title: Changes saved
Colony will pay your gas fees on supported chains.
You will pay your own gas fees on all chains.
advancedSettings.rpc.title: Custom RPC Endpoints
advancedSettings.rpc.description: If you prefer maximum decentralization, you may use your own custom endpoints for Colony
advancedSettings.rpc.subtitle: Gnosis Chain Custom RPC
advancedSettings.rpc.tooltip: You will be able to toggle the Gnosis Chain RPC on once you have successfully validated that the endpoint works.
advancedSettings.rpc.errorEmpty: The field can not be empty in order to validate the RPC
advancedSettings.rpc.errorUnable: Response failed. Check details and try again
advancedSettings.rpc.toast.description: Custom RPC endpoint saved and enabled.
advancedSettings.account.title: Account data
advancedSettings.account.description: Download your Colony data in a .csv file format
advancedSettings.delete.title: Account deletion
advancedSettings.delete.modal.title: We're sorry to see you go
advancedSettings.delete.modal.descriptio: Deleting your account means you could potentially lose funds and access to the following areas and account information on Colony. {br} {br} While you can delete your Colony account, you are not able to delete  content on chain. {br} {br} Deleting your Colony account is irreversible and you will need to recreate another Colony account.
advancedSettings.delete.modal.info2: You will lose your account settings
advancedSettings.delete.modal.info3: You will lose all of your Colony DAO subscriptions
advancedSettings.delete.modal.info4: You will lose your comment history
advancedSettings.delete.modal.info5: You will lose access to your username
advancedSettings.delete.modal.checkbox.l: I understand that deleted accounts aren't recoverable
colonyDetailsPage.title: Colony Details
colonyDetailsPage.description: Change the details of the Colony
colonyDetailsPage.tempDescription: SatelliteDAO is a decentralised community that focuses on supporting the launch satellites and space exploration initiatives.
colonyDetailsPage.objectiveDescription: Colony objectives area the main goal or mission of the Colony all member’s are contributing towards. The objective appears on the main Dashboard of the Colony and progress of the goal is visible. {br} {br} Each update requires a motion progress or the correct Colony wide permissions.
colonyDetailsPage.noObjectiveBoxDescript: There are no objectives set for the Colony. Once created, the objective will update here.
extensionsPage.title: Extensions
extensionsPage.description: Extend the functionality of your Colony
advancedPage.title: Advanced settings
advancedPage.colony.title: Colony version
advancedPage.recovery.title: Recovery Mode
advancedPage.recovery.description: If you believe that something dangerous is happening in your colony (e.g. the Colony is under attack), recovery mode will disable the colony and prevent further activity until the issue has been overcome.
advancedPage.recovery.notification: Note: Leaving recovery requires the approval of a majority of members holding the Recovery permission.
advancedPage.version.success: Your Colony version is up to date
advancedPage.version.warning: An upgrade for your Colony is available
calamityBanner.available: A new version of the Colony Network is available!
calamityBanner.recoveryMode: The Colony is in Recovery mode. You are unable to perform any actions until Recovery Mode is exited.
extensionDetailsPage.uninstallSuccessDes: You can reinstall the extension at anytime
extensionDetailsPage.uninstallDescriptio: Uninstalling this extension will permanently delete all actions associated with this extension from this Colony. Ensure you understand the potential risks before continuing.
extensionDetailsPage.uninstallBoxOne: All actions will disappear from the application and can never be recovered.
extensionDetailsPage.uninstallBoxTwo: Please ensure that all funds in processes associated with this extension are claimed by their owners before uninstalling. Not doing so will result in permanent loss of the unclaimed funds.
extensionDetailsPage.uninstallConfirmati: I understand that there is a risk of lost funds and past actions will disappear from the interface.
extensionDetailsPage.deprecateDescriptio: This extension must first be deprecated if you wish to uninstall it. After deprecation, any actions using this extension that are already underway may be completed, but it will no longer be possible to create new actions from this extension.
extensionDetailsPage.confirmation: Are you sure you wish to proceed?
extensionReEnable.modal.title: Re-enable extension
extensionReEnable.modal.subTitle: The extension will be re-enabled with the same parameters. Are you sure you wish to proceed?
extensionReEnable.notification.missing: The Colony is missing permissions required for this extensions.
extensionReEnable.notification.updated: The required permissions have been updated. You can now enable the extension.
extensionUpgrade.toast.description.succe: The extension has been upgraded to the latest version.
extensionUpgrade.toast.description.error: Due to a transaction error, the extension did not upgrade.
extensions.lazy.consensus.description: These parameters cannot be changed without reinstalling the extension.
permissions.list.title: Permissions the extension needs in the colony:

teamReputation.reputationPoints.label: All Teams Reputation Points
members.ban.info: This action only prevents this member from commenting in this Colony. They will still be able to interact with any smart contracts they have permission to use.
members.ban.textarea.label: Decision reason (Optional)
members.ban.tooltip: Choose whether the member should be sent a notification of this
members.unban.notify: Notify member they have been unbanned
members.unban.info: This action gives the member permissions to chat again within this Colony.
user.status.tooltip.desc: This user is in the top {percentNum}% of contributors within this Colony.
description.username: You can change your username every 90 days
description.avatar: A blockie is used as a default upon account creation. You can change this at anytime
description.bio: Your bio is optional and shows on your Colony profile in under 200 characters
description.discord: Get notified of your subscribed events right within Discord
description.browserNotification: Get notified in your browser of subscribed events on Colony
description.mentionsNotification: Recieve emails when you’re username is mentioned across Colony DAO’s
description.disableNotification: Disable all notifications across all Colony DAOs
field.display: Enable action and motion windows as full screen
description.display: As default, all action and motion windows appear as a side panel
description.emailNotification: If enabled, we’ll send you information about Colony’s new product features and updates
description.location: Your location is optional and only shown on your Colony profile
error.displayName.valid.message: This is not a valid colony username
errors.website.message: Website format is incorrect, please try again
displayName.input.disabled: You can change your username again in 15 days
avatar.uploader.info: Must be .PNG, .JPG or .SVG, at least 250x250px in size and can not exceed 1MB.
too.large.file.error: File size is too large, it should not exceed 1MB
invalid.type.error: Incorrect file format, must be .PNG, .JPG, or .SVG
upload.avatar.successfully.toast.title: Profile image changed successfully
upload.avatar.successfully.toast.descrip: You can update this again at any time
